title: Radisson Hotel Group to open a hotel every 20 days in India this year, says top exec
description: "People are visiting religious destinations far more than pre Covid times. We were the first to launch a branded hotel in Ayodhya before the Ram temple inauguration. The hotel clocked an average daily rate of Rs 1.15 lakh in the first month. It is still sold out on most days and the average daily rate is Rs 30,000 now,” said Nikhil Sharma, the chain’s new managing director.
